rows.label: xs04060100_MSG0001
rows.name: F-friends, hold up! Something coming ahead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04060100_MSG0002
rows.name: H-hey! Down in front! I can't see![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04060100_MSG0005
rows.name: Whatever it is, at least it's not a Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04060100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Perish the thought, good sirs, perish and kill the thought!
We would never associate with those savages![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04060100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Ah, yes, a thousand pardons. We are called "L'cirufe".
Or just "L," if it please you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04060100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Like the proud Nopon among you, we have
inhabited this planet since times of antiquity.[ST:wait ]
